Name: draw a card -Simulator
About the game: 'Draw a card!' Sounds familiar? You don't even need a board game or a party magician anymore, this simulator will fulfill all your needs! Explore the wonderful, unbelievable and overwhelming world of 'Draw a Card Simulator'. Experience three tremendously exciting game modes: easy, infinite and magical! Easy: Just like the name implies: Win by using a tactical approach and trained skills and pick a card! Infinite: Can you pick all the cards until the deck is empty? Propably not...but you can try! In this mode you can sit back, enjoy the tunes and do like the game title says: 'Draw a Card!' Magic: Do you like Magic? Do you like Card Tricks? Then this mode is for you! Let this most spectacular and genius Card Trick blow your mind and change your world. Let's go and pick a card! This game is suitable for children and adults. Have fun! UPDATE 20.08.2021 'Draw a Card- Simulator' presents: WASTELAND - DLC Now included in the base game for free!! Additionally to the already known game this DLC offers completely new Wasteland graphics, backgrounds and a whole new easter egg :wink: Have fun! (Thx to Mando Media Cosplay Germany ;) )
